LanguageData.RT_PzIVH_Vehicle.label: Pz.IV H
LanguageData.RT_PzIVH_Vehicle.description:
A medium tank that be called as German Warhorse, could handle many kinds of mission, equipped extra side armor to provied better protection.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x3, MG Gunner x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
90mm (Main cannon)
7.62x54mm (Hull and Coaxial MG)
